mapper.select: select * from t_watermeter where meter_no = #{meterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}
mapper.update: update t_watermeter set read_time = #{readTime}, read_value = #{readValue}, pre_read_time = #{preReadTime}, pre_read_value = #{preReadValue}, day_amount = #{dayAmount}, month_amount = #{monthAmount}, state = #{state} where watermeter_id = #{watermeterId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_watermeter( meter_no, u_id, c_id, caliber, install_time, read_time, read_value, pre_read_time, pre_read_value, day_amount, month_amount, state, enprNo ) values ( #{meterNo}, #{uId}, #{cId}, #{caliber}, #{installTime}, #{readTime}, #{readValue}, #{preReadTime}, #{preReadValue}, #{dayAmount}, #{monthAmount}, #{state}, #{enprNo} )
mapper.select: select distinct meter_no from t_watermeter where enprNo = #{enprNo}
select * from t_watermeter where is_delete = 0 and c_id = #{cid} and state = 1

select meter.watermeter_id, meter.meter_no, meter.u_id, meter.c_id, meter.caliber, meter.install_time, meter.read_time, meter.read_value, meter.pre_read_time, meter.pre_read_value, meter.day_amount, meter.month_amount, meter.state, meter.enprNo from ( select u_id from t_user where u_no = #{uNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo} and is_delete = 0 ) u left join t_watermeter meter on u.u_id = meter.u_id where meter.is_delete = 0
